name: Evolvorous
description:
Evolvorous is a game about species evolution who depending on abilities that they get, they adapt their body in front of environnemental conditions, fights and the kind of food that they eat.

In Evolvorous, you play a species who have to evolve by developing her body and his way of living in order to survive.

And you can mix all the species !

Control : Use mouse and follow tutorial (on the top-right of the screen).
